CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.2.i.6a, reactionduration (5N)
E2B (R3): E.i.6a Duration of Reaction / Event (number) Conformance: Optional, but required if E.i.6b is populated. Data Type: 5N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This section will usually be computed from the start/end date and time of the reaction/event. However, there might be situations in which the precise duration of the reaction/event and date can be useful.
CustomField.label: Duration of Reaction/Event
